sidebar.infoText: Please rate the following scales based on how you feel right at this moment.
sidebar.ratingEntertain: How entertaining is this content to you
sidebar.ratingAppropriate: Do you think it is appropriate to show this content on Facebook
sidebar.questionKnown: Is this post about a topic that you have already been interested in?
sidebar.questionNotice: What made you decide to read this post?
sidebar.questionQuality: Did you examine the quality of the information? If so, how?

surveyDisengage.infoText: Please rate the following statements using the following scale (1 = Strongly disagree, 5 = Strongly agree), which reflects your experience on Facebook JUST NOW.
surveyDisengage.ratingAwareness: It seems I am ‘running on automatic’ when using Facebook, without much awareness of what I am doing.
surveyDisengage.ratingActivities: I rush through activities (e.g., posting status updates, commenting, launching apps, joining groups) on Facebook without being really attentive to them.
surveyDisengage.ratingCheckUpdates: I quickly check updates from Facebook without being aware that I am using it.
